channel.title: Starter command
channel.description:
ok. i made a starter command. but where do i put the starter=0 in character files? here is the command [code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0 || playerRights > 1) { addItem(995, 50000000); addItem(392, 15000); addItem(554, 20000); addItem(555, 20000); addItem(565, 20000); addItem(556, 20000); addItem(557, 20000); addItem(560, 20000); addItem(561, 20000); addItem(562, 20000); addItem(563, 20000); addItem(566, 20000); addItem(558, 20000); sM("IronScape Starter Package"); starter = 1; savegame(true); } else if (starter == 1) { sM("Sorry. You already got your starter package..");
} }[/code] and here is the character file [code][ACCOUNT] character-username = Thunderflea character-password = LOLNOTPOSTINGTHIS
[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3000 character-posy = 3379 character-rights = 0 character-lastconnection = 127.0.0.1 character-special = 100 character-tz = -1 character-starter = 1 character-pouch1 = 0 character-pouch2 = 0 character-pouch3 = 0 character-pouch4 = 0 character-energy = 100 character-taskID = -1 character-taskAmount = -1 character-jad = 0 character-q1 = 0 character-q2 = 0 character-q3 = 0 character-q4 = 0 character-q5 = 0 character-q6 = 0 character-q7 = 0 character-q8 = 0 character-q9 = 0 character-q10 = 0 character-q11 = 0 character-brightness = 0 character-fighttype = 1 character-skill = 0 character-chat = 0 character-ancients = 0 character-pin = 0 character-saradomin = 0 character-retaliate = 0 character-action = 0 character-pcpoints = 0 character-assault = 0 character-donator = 0 character-bow = 100 character-shield = 100
[EQUIPMENT] character-equip = 0 -1 0 character-equip = 1 -1 0 character-equip = 2 -1 0 character-equip = 3 -1 0 character-equip = 4 -1 0 character-equip = 5 -1 0 character-equip = 6 -1 0 character-equip = 7 -1 0 character-equip = 8 -1 0 character-equip = 9 -1 0 character-equip = 10 -1 0 character-equip = 11 -1 0 character-equip = 12 -1 0 character-equip = 13 -1 0
[LOOK] character-look = 0 0 character-look = 1 0 character-look = 2 10 character-look = 3 18 character-look = 4 26 character-look = 5 33 character-look = 6 36 character-look = 7 42 character-look = 8 0 character-look = 9 0 character-look = 10 0 character-look = 11 0 character-look = 12 0 character-look = 13 0 character-look = 14 0 character-look = 15 0 character-look = 16 0 character-look = 17 0 character-look = 18 0
[SKILLS] character-skill = 0 1 0 character-skill = 1 1 0 character-skill = 2 1 0 character-skill = 3 10 1155 character-skill = 4 1 0 character-skill = 5 1 0 character-skill = 6 1 0 character-skill = 7 1 0 character-skill = 8 1 0 character-skill = 9 1 0 character-skill = 10 1 0 character-skill = 11 1 0 character-skill = 12 1 0 character-skill = 13 1 0 character-skill = 14 1 0 character-skill = 15 1 0 character-skill = 16 1 0 character-skill = 17 1 0 character-skill = 18 1 0 character-skill = 19 1 0 character-skill = 20 1 0 character-skill = 21 1 0 character-skill = 22 1 0 character-skill = 23 1 0 character-skill = 24 1 0
[ITEMS] character-item = 0 1292 1 character-item = 1 1172 1 character-item = 2 842 1 character-item = 3 883 200 character-item = 4 381 200 character-item = 5 996 20000 character-item = 6 1292 1 character-item = 7 1172 1 character-item = 8 842 1

item.title: Starter command
item.dc:creator: @thunderflea thunderflea
item.description:
@thunderflea wrote:

ok. but where is the starter information in the client? ill look for the item numbers. thanks for the help and ideas.

Read full topic

item.title: Starter command
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

You could change the condition for the starter to be 1 not 0, than when you do the command make it equal 2.

if (starter == 1) {

    starter = 2;

Read full topic

item.title: Starter command
item.dc:creator: @thunderflea thunderflea
item.description:
@thunderflea wrote:

i am using delta. how do i change that starter thing?

Read full topic

item.title: Starter command
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Well actually, he may be using delta, which gives you your starter the first time you login, putting the starter at 1.

Read full topic

item.title: Starter command
item.dc:creator: @thunderflea thunderflea
item.description:
@thunderflea wrote:

whats that mean? 1) character-starter = 1 - Thats "starter" but its = 1 cause you already did it
and those items are just for now. but what do i add in my char files. when i type ::starter
it says already has starter package. but i dont yet. i need to add a starter spot in the char files.
also the command isnt for admins. it works so admins can get it unlimitid times. while a non admin only gets it once.

Read full topic

item.title: Starter command
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

2 things.

  1. character-starter = 1 - Thats “starter” but its = 1 cause you already did it
  2. your code is for Admins+
    try this.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, 50000000); addItem(392, 15000); addItem(554, 20000); addItem(555, 20000); addItem(565, 20000); addItem(556, 20000); addItem(557, 20000); addItem(560, 20000); addItem(561, 20000); addItem(562, 20000); addItem(563, 20000); addItem(566, 20000); addItem(558, 20000); sM("IronScape Starter Package"); starter = 1; savegame(true); } else if (starter == 1) { sM("Sorry. You already got your starter package.."); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Starter command
item.dc:creator: @thunderflea thunderflea
item.description:
@thunderflea wrote:

ok. i made a starter command. but where do i put the starter=0 in character files?
here is the command

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0 || playerRights > 1) {
addItem(995, 50000000);
addItem(392, 15000);
addItem(554, 20000);
addItem(555, 20000);
addItem(565, 20000);
addItem(556, 20000);
addItem(557, 20000);
addItem(560, 20000);
addItem(561, 20000);
addItem(562, 20000);
addItem(563, 20000);
addItem(566, 20000);
addItem(558, 20000);
sM(“IronScape Starter Package”);
starter = 1;
savegame(true);
} else if (starter == 1) {
sM(“Sorry. You already got your starter package…”);

        }
    }[/code]

and here is the character file

[code][ACCOUNT]
